title: Kind Of Pissed Off Now
body:
So me being a bronze ranked player i play alot of ranked and i queued up with some mates last game i got my pref role for once i locked in everything was fine then loading took for ever i finally load in and click to where my krugs are since i was jax jungle and i see that its not pathing me towards my jungle but its auto running me right to the other teams spawn now i thought wtf maybe i miss clicked so i clicked my krugs again and it just took me more into mid lane so i recalled waited a few seconds clicked again back to mid lane recalled told team not to worry i would be back soon just going to restart cos i think my game is bugging out so i quit try to reconnect i was gone for 2 minutes and it brings up the " you have been disconnected due to prolonged afk" now iw as gone for 2 minutes i thought that timer kicked in after 5 but anyways so i exit try to reconnect again and same thing i got yelled at by my team in after game as i never got to leave base after my first restart now im placed in LPQ again ater i have been trying to stay away from them and i know that you guys wont remove them but can i at least have a answer to wtf is going on i thought afk system was 5 minutes not 2 this auto pathing mid thing is fucking my ranked stats up and now my friends think im a troll 

Rioter Assistance would be nice 


Super Pissed.

replies.body: this happened to me last year i was very pissed off

Its a very rare bug, happened to some ppl on youtube too. Even oddone got it in a game ages ago.

Just unluggy tbh
so riotis bringing out like 9 reworks 9 new skins but they cant even fix shit that even pros get well that shows how fucked rito gams are

Different teams work on different things. The rework and skins teams are completely different from each other, let a lone all the gameplay coding team. 

It sucks that bugs happen sometimes, and it sucks even more that you had to experience such a big one in a ranked game.

 LPQ punishments can be handed out even after 1 ranked leave, as ranked is seen as a more competitive environment and players get extra-frustrated if someone has to go in the middle of their game (no matter what the reason). Even if you only DC for the first 5ish minutes, you still put your team at a disadvantage, and players can start tilting off this.

You won't be taken out of LPQ unfortunately, but it might be a good idea to flick [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) a ticket, detailing the bug you encountered. It may give you some proof to show your friends you aren't a troll.
